name: Wagyu
description: In general, the global Wagyu beef market garnered a $25 billion valuation which is expected to rise $40 billion over the next 10 years. Japan remains home to the largest number of Wagyu, followed by Australia and the United States. But as you can see there's a global appetite for the delicious Wagyu. Wagyu is often identified as "the most expensive beef in the world, being praised for cultivating the "art of meat”. It is an ancient breed of cow which actually originated in Japan. Steep with over 35,000 years of history. The Wagyu community aka “The Herd” will strive to become a globalised community, approachable for all in humanity. Aiming to become the newest, hottest crypto. Epic social media raids, influencer events, memes, you name it! The wagyu community will be the driving force, the heart and soul, the soothing classical music the makes such beautiful Wagyu.
